Are we finished?
I suppose so.
I'll be just a moment.
You look a bit sad, Captain Harville.
translation.zh: ‎你看起来有点难过 哈维尔舰长

translation.en: Well, actually, I should be happy.
Captain Benwick has found love at last.
translation.zh: ‎本维克舰长终于找到了真爱

translation.en: That's wonderful. I should think you would be pleased.
translation.zh: ‎太好了 你不是应该开心才对吗？

translation.en: You were so determined to see him out of his misery.
translation.zh: ‎你当时铁了心想让他摆脱痛苦

translation.en: But I hadn't anticipated the effect it would have on me.
translation.zh:
‎但我当时不知道
‎那会对我造成什么影响

translation.en: It's as if his suffering was keeping my sister alive somehow.
translation.zh:
‎他的痛苦就好像以某种方式
‎延续着我妹妹的生命

translation.en: Poor Fanny. She would never have forgotten him so soon.
translation.zh:
‎可怜的范妮 她绝对
‎不会像他这么快就移情别恋

translation.en: Well, that's certain.
We women do not forget you so soon as you forget us.
translation.zh:
‎我们女人很专情
‎不像你们男人忘情那么快

translation.en: Women love beyond all sensible limits.
translation.zh: ‎女人的爱超越了一切理智规划的界限

translation.en: We cannot help ourselves.
I don't mean to venture any claims about the differences between men and women.
translation.zh: ‎我不敢妄议男女之间的差别

translation.en: [Anne] Oh, well, I will.
The only privilege I claim for my sex is that of loving longest.
translation.zh:
‎我认为我们女人唯一的特权
‎就是能拥有最长久的爱

translation.en: Loving even when hope is gone.
translation.zh: ‎即使没有了希望也继续爱着

translation.en: Loving because you don't have a choice.
translation.zh: ‎因为别无选择 所以继续爱着

translation.en: -[Frederick] I'm finished. -[Harville] Thank you.
There is no quarreling with you.
I think Fanny would be happy to see her Benwick cared for.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得要是范妮看到本维克得到照顾
‎她会很欣慰的

translation.en: [Harville] Fanny was never the jealous type.
In moments I've wondered if it wasn't my sister's spirit in the wind
translation.zh:
‎我甚至在想当时是不是
‎我妹妹飘在空中的灵魂在作祟

translation.en: that caused Louisa to slip,
knowing somehow eventually where she would land.
translation.zh: ‎她知道路易莎最终会落到哪里

translation.en: Louisa?
I've told you,
the universe has perfect timing.
And when you had the presence of mind to tell Benwick to fetch a surgeon,
translation.zh: ‎当你沉着地让本维克去找医生时

translation.en: you must have had no idea the wheels that you were setting in motion.
translation.zh:
‎当时你肯定不知道
‎将会引发的蝴蝶效应

translation.en: Captain, I'm afraid I'm lost.
I'm speaking of Louisa's engagement to Captain Benwick, of course.
translation.zh: ‎我指的是路易莎和本维克舰长的婚事

translation.en: A love grown slow and sure
from his constant attention to her during her convalescence.
translation.zh:
‎因为他在她康复期间
‎时常给她无微不至的照顾

translation.en: Of what did you think I was speaking?
I don't know.
[Harville] I'll make sure this letter gets to Admiral Croft.
translation.zh:
‎我会确保
‎这封信能顺利到达克罗夫特上将手中

translation.en: "Dear Anne…"
"…I can listen no longer in silence."
translation.zh: ‎我不能默不作声地听下去了”

translation.en: "Anne, you pierce my soul."
translation.zh: ‎“安妮 你刺痛了我的灵魂”

translation.en: "Dare not say that man forgets sooner than woman,
translation.zh: ‎“我不敢说男人比女人忘情快

translation.en: that his love has an earlier death."
"I am half agony, half hope."
translation.zh: ‎“我半怀着痛苦 半怀着希望”

translation.en: "I know you are to marry Mr. Elliot,
translation.zh: ‎“我知道你将要嫁给艾略特先生

translation.en: but I will never forgive myself if I do not tell you this."
translation.zh:
‎但如果我不跟你坦白
‎我将永远不能原谅自己”

translation.en: "You alone have brought me to Bath." [gasps]
"For you alone I think and plan."
translation.zh: ‎“我的一切考虑和规划都是为了你”

translation.en: "But of course you have not seen this. How could you?"
translation.zh:
‎“但你当然是没看出来
‎你又怎么能看得出来？”

translation.en: "Because your love has not lasted as long as mine."
translation.zh:
‎“因为你对我的爱
‎并不及我对你的持久”

translation.en: "Anne…
I have loved no one but you."
"And I don't think I ever will."
translation.zh: ‎“我想我永远不会爱上别人了”

translation.en: Anne.
-I can explain-- -I wish you both every happiness. [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎-我可以解释…
‎-我祝你们都能幸福

translation.en: [Frederick] "I have thought many times about how to tell you,
translation.zh: ‎“我想过很多次要怎么跟你说这事”

translation.en: but the pain of a love unrequited rendered me silent."
"Tell me not that I am too late."
Frederick!
[Frederick] "My love for you has never faltered."
[Anne] There are many kinds of love.
For some, the right partnership can be a lucrative endeavor.
translation.zh:
‎对某些人来说 找到合适的伴侣
‎可以是一场获利丰厚的尝试

translation.en: For others, true connection is reward enough.
translation.zh:
‎对于其他人来说
‎获得真正的感情就已弥足珍贵了

translation.en: [whispers] Where are they?
[Anne] It's okay to find love on your terms…
translation.zh: ‎你可以按照自己的标准去寻找真爱 ‎（欧洲之旅 低调奢华）

translation.en: however unorthodox.
Don't let anyone tell you how to live.
translation.zh: ‎别让任何人告诉你该怎么生活

translation.en: Or who to love.
I learned the hard way.
translation.zh: ‎我吃了一番苦头才懂得这个道理

translation.en: Tilt the sextant until the image of the sun kisses the horizon.
translation.zh: ‎倾斜六分仪 直到太阳和地平线相触

translation.en: [Anne] Right, lined up.
That angle is called your sight. We would normally take a note of that.
translation.zh:
‎那个角度就是你的视线
‎我们通常要记住这个角度

translation.en: Using various mathematical equations and accounting for the height of the cliff,
translation.zh: ‎然后用数学方程式代入悬崖的高度后

translation.en: we can estimate our latitude.
translation.zh: ‎我们就能估算这里的纬度了

translation.en: That's all?
Well, I won't tell anyone how painfully easy nautical navigation is.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 原来航海这么简单
‎我不会告诉别人的

translation.en: It might tarnish the Navy's reputation.
translation.zh: ‎不然可能会破坏海军的名声

translation.en: Well, on behalf of the Crown, we thank you for your discretion.
translation.zh: ‎我们代表王室感谢你守口如瓶

translation.en: I was thinking, perhaps we can enjoy a quick anchoring in Venice
translation.zh: ‎我在想 也许去康斯坦丁堡之前

translation.en: before Constantinople?
translation.zh: ‎我们可以开到威尼斯玩一会儿

translation.en: Do you know what it takes to turn a ship around?
translation.zh: ‎你知道让船改航要花多大功夫吗？

translation.en: Yes.
From personal experience.
♪ Just the same as before ♪
translation.zh: ‎（改编自简奥斯汀的小说《劝导》）
